channel.title: Server crashers be gone!....plz?
channel.description: ok i got a small problem with server crashers, they log in with 3 chars, have an auto talker which lags, and later crashes the server. what i really want is a way to stop them from...plainly logging in but if that isn't possible i could really use a right-click option that allows admins to: 1. kick 2. ban and mods to: 1. kick. anyone got anything for either of those 2 solutions? :) ty in advance[br][size=1]Posted on: November 05, 2007, 06:02:03 PM[/size][hr]anyone at all?

item.title: Server crashers be gone!....plz?
item.dc:creator: @omg_ffs_ownd omg ffs ownd
item.description:
@omg_ffs_ownd wrote:
